title: Does the camera quality of smartphones degrade with time? - Quora

response.answer_text: Quality of the camera phones rarely degrades, that to due to dust or sensor malfunctioning. But if you were to compare the quality of a particular smart phone, say an iPhone 6, to the quality of the same iPhone 6 after couple of years, you can barely point out any difference. On the other hand, comparing the quality of iPhone 7 2017 model to another phone of similar specifications for camera, might be superior or inferior, depending on the quality of hardware, and how well it functions with the software. Though for vanila android users, Camera app by Google is way more accurate and sharp as compared to some other devices. For example, Google Pixel 2. My answer was based on my 3 years experience on HTC Desire 816 ,3 years experience of iPhone 5s and 1 year experience of iPhone 7 and counting.
